alert.note: Alert for Benton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 10:12PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BENTON AND SOUTHEASTERN DELAWARE COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM CDT... At 1011 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Maysville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Bella Vista... Siloam Springs... Gentry... Gravette... Decatur... West Siloam Springs... Colcord... Maysville... Lake Eucha State Park... Cherokee City... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
